page.title: 01RECREATION :CHILDRENS GAMES
page.content: Here are some of the games we play at Crooks Piece. We sometimes play " 123 in" or rounders or British bulldog. Sometimes we might play winkmurder or squeezemurder which is very boring because it can go on for ever and ever.In rounders we always end up arguing.The game" 123" is quite easy. Some ones on it. On it means that one person closes their eyes and counts up to 100 .While the person is counting the other children hide.Sometimes we hide behind trailers,behind straw,in the barn,and in farm sheds.When they have counted to 100 they start looking for people .If they see someone they shout "One two three out" and if someone gets back to base they shout "One two three in".Me ,Tracy ,Alan, Martin and Andrea usually chase Lesley Romain home.She is a bit too old for
